title: Handle a Trip Payment Dispute
description: A rider claims they were charged for a trip they didn't take. A support agent must investigate.

tasks.description: Find the disputed trip charge in the rider's history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the specific trip record.

tasks.description: Review the trip data, including GPS start/end points and device information used to request the trip.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the trip's digital footprint.

tasks.description: The data shows the trip was requested from the rider's registered device and started near their home address. Conclude the charge is likely valid.
Inform the rider of the findings and deny the refund request, explaining the evidence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the decision clearly and professionally.
